Key Match Events: Wendell Moore Jr. and Marcus Sasser brought huge energy and made key contributions in the fourth quarter
Ron Holland II had a strong game with 10 points, 8 rebounds, and 3 steals
Malik Beasley led the team in scoring with 20 points
Post-Match Reflections: Cade Cunningham praised the efforts of Wendell Moore Jr., Marcus Sasser, and Ron Holland II
Cunningham also expressed appreciation for the mental strength of Ron Holland II
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pistons won their second game in East Group B of the In-Season Tournament
Jaden Ivey returned from a toe injury and contributed 14 points in 28 minutes
The Pistons played without Tim Hardaway Jr. and Simone Fontecchio due to injury
Others: Cade Cunningham struggled with his scoring efficiency, shooting 6-21 from the field
Gradey Dick had a tough shooting night, scoring 16 points on 4-17 shooting from the field
